items.name: Ease
items.summary:
An easing function type. Easing functions specify the rate of change of
a parameter over time.

syntax.content: public enum Ease
Linear = 0
SineIn = 1
SineOut = 2
SineInOut = 3
CubicIn = 4
CubicOut = 5
CubicInOut = 6
QuadIn = 7
QuadOut = 8
QuadInOut = 9
QuartIn = 10
QuartOut = 11
QuartInOut = 12
QuintIn = 13
QuintOut = 14
QuintInOut = 15
ExpoIn = 16
ExpoOut = 17
ExpoInOut = 18
CircIn = 19
CircOut = 20
CircInOut = 21
BackIn = 22
BackOut = 23
BackInOut = 24
ElasticIn = 25
ElasticOut = 26
ElasticInOut = 27
BounceIn = 28
BounceOut = 29
BounceInOut = 30

items.name: Interpolater<T>
items.summary: A function delegate that interpolates the value between a and b by t.

syntax.content: public delegate T Interpolater<T>(T a, T b, float t, bool snapping);

parameters.description: The start value.
The end value.

items.name: LoopType
items.summary: A type of loop style.

syntax.content: public enum LoopType

items.name: Restart
items.summary: Restarts the tween from the beginning after it ends.

syntax.content: Restart = 0

items.name: RestartWithDelay
items.summary:
Restarts the tween from the beginning after it ends. If the tween
has a delay it will be delayed again each loop.

syntax.content: RestartWithDelay = 1

items.name: PingPong
items.summary:
Plays the tween forwards then backwards then forwards then
backwards, etc.

syntax.content: PingPong = 2

items.name: PingPongWithDelay
items.summary:
Plays the tween forwards then backwards then forwards then
backwards, etc.  If the tween has a delay it will be delayed again
each loop.

syntax.content: PingPongWithDelay = 3

items.summary:
Provides method chaining for tweens. This allows multiple properties to
be assigned in a single statement without requiring a variable to store
the intermediate results.

retrieved and destroyed based on that target.

own state and can be controlled the same as any other tween.

items.name: TweenCallback
items.summary:
A function delegate that can be invoked during various tween events
and/or state changes.

syntax.content: public delegate void TweenCallback();

items.name: Tween
items.summary: The base class of every tween.

syntax.content: public abstract class Tween

items.name: id
items.summary:
An identifier that can be used to distinguish the tween from others.
This is not explicitly required nor is it necessarily unique. The id
is often used to identify which object the parameter being animated
belongs to, and often that object is animating multiple parameters.

syntax.content: public int id

items.name: sceneIndex
items.summary:
The index of the scene that contains the object being animated by
the tween. The is used to kill the tween when the scene is unloaded.

syntax.content: public int sceneIndex

items.name: state
items.summary: The animation state of the tween.

syntax.content: public TweenState state { get; }

items.name: IsPlaying
items.summary: Whether the tween is playing.

syntax.content: public bool IsPlaying { get; }

items.name: IsStopped
items.summary: Whether the tween is stopped.

syntax.content: public bool IsStopped { get; }

items.name: IsComplete
items.summary: Whether the tween is complete.

syntax.content: public bool IsComplete { get; }

items.name: IsKilled
items.summary: Whether the tween is killed.

syntax.content: public bool IsKilled { get; }

items.name: ease
items.summary: The easing function type used by the tween to animate values.

syntax.content: public Ease ease

items.name: duration
items.summary: The amount of seconds the tween takes to complete.

syntax.content: public float duration

items.name: elapsed
items.summary: The amount of seconds that have elapsed since the tween started.

syntax.content: public float elapsed { get; }

items.name: PercentComplete
items.summary: The tween's percentage of completion.

syntax.content: public float PercentComplete { get; }

items.name: delay
items.summary:
The amount of seconds the tween waits before playing after being
started.

syntax.content: public float delay

items.name: delayElapsed
items.summary:
The amount of seconds that have elapsed during the tween's delayed
state, when applicable.

syntax.content: public float delayElapsed { get; }

items.name: IsDelayed
items.summary:
Whether the tween is currently in a delayed state, i.e., the tween
has been started but the elapsed time has not exceeded the delay
duration.

syntax.content: public bool IsDelayed { get; }

items.name: loops
items.summary:
The number of times the tween loops. A value of -1 will loop the
tween infinitely.

syntax.content: public int loops

items.name: loopType
items.summary: The style in which the tween loops.

syntax.content: public LoopType loopType

items.name: iterations
items.summary: The number of times the tween has completed.

syntax.content: public int iterations { get; }

items.name: reversed
items.summary:
Animates from the end value to the start value as opposed to
animating from the start value to the end value like normal.

syntax.content: public bool reversed { get; set; }

items.name: snapping
items.summary: Smoothly snaps all interpolated values to whole numbers.

syntax.content: public bool snapping { get; set; }

items.name: recyclable
items.summary: Keeps the tween in memory to be re-used after being killed.

syntax.content: public bool recyclable { get; set; }

items.name: autoStart
items.summary: Automatically starts the tween after being created.

syntax.content: public bool autoStart { get; set; }

items.name: autoKill
items.summary: Automatically kills the tween after being completed.

syntax.content: public bool autoKill { get; set; }

items.name: onUpdate
items.summary:
The callback invoked every time the tween is updated, i.e., any time
the parameter being animated is changed.

syntax.content: public TweenCallback onUpdate

items.name: onStart
items.summary: The callback invoked when the tween is started.

syntax.content: public TweenCallback onStart

items.name: onStop
items.summary: The callback invoked when the tween is stopped.

syntax.content: public TweenCallback onStop

items.name: onLoop
items.summary: The callback invoked when the tween is looped.

syntax.content: public TweenCallback onLoop

items.name: onComplete
items.summary: The callback invoked when the tween is completed.

syntax.content: public TweenCallback onComplete

items.name: onKill
items.summary: The callback invoked when the tween is killed.

syntax.content: public TweenCallback onKill

A tween that animates a parameter over time from a start value to an end
value.

items.summary:
The function that interpolates values between the tween's start and
end value.

items.summary:
The function that gets the current value of the parameter being
tweened.

items.summary: The function that sets a new value of the parameter being tweened.

syntax.content: public TweenSetter<T> setter

items.summary: The initial value of the parameter at the start of the tween.

items.name: endValue

syntax.content: public Tweener()

items.summary: Animates the parameter being tweened to the current state.

syntax.content: public override void Animate()

items.summary: Override to handle custom logic when the tween is started.

syntax.content: protected override void OnStart()

items.summary: Override to handle custom logic when the tween is killed.

syntax.content: protected override void OnKill()

items.summary: Override to handle custom logic when the tween is reset.

items.summary: A function delegate that gets the current value of a parameter.

syntax.content: public delegate T TweenGetter<T>();

return.description: The current value of the parameter.

items.name: TweenSetter<T>
items.summary: A function delegate that sets a new value of a parameter.

syntax.content: public delegate void TweenSetter<T>(T value);

parameters.description: The new value of the parameter.

items.name: TweenState
items.summary: A type of animation state that a tween can be in.

syntax.content: public enum TweenState

items.name: Ready
items.summary: The tween has been initialized and is ready to be played.

syntax.content: Ready = 0

items.name: Playing
items.summary: The tween is currently playing and receiving updates.

syntax.content: Playing = 1

items.name: Stopped
items.summary: The tween is currently stopped/paused.

syntax.content: Stopped = 2

items.name: Complete
items.summary: The tween has completed but not yet killed.

syntax.content: Complete = 3

items.name: Killed
items.summary: The tween is killed, making it no longer usable.

syntax.content: Killed = 4
